allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor: Extract isolated column components to reduce flickering

- Create centralized app-store.js for state management \(similar to OpenTUI''s
  dirty region tracking pattern\)
- Extract LeftColumn component \(Progress, Goals, Tickers, Projects\)
- Extract RightColumn component \(Portfolio, Trading History, Wealth\)
- Extract AppFooterBar component \(Tier, View Mode, Shortcuts\)
- Add useAppStore hook for components to subscribe to specific state slices
- Add useStoreSync hook to bridge existing useState to the store
- Fix ShimmerState to manage its own tick subscription \(isolates animation
  re-renders from parent panel\)

This architecture change means:
- Each column subscribes only to the data it needs
- Updates to one column don''t trigger re-renders of other columns
- The shimmer animation only re-renders the ShimmerState component,
  not the entire AgentActivityPanel

Inspired by OpenTUI''s approach: double buffering, dirty region tracking,
and isolated component updates.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix table alignment in portfolio and ticker score panels

Portfolio Panel:
- Align columns: SYM\(6\) QTY\(4\) VALUE\(7\) TODAY\(8\) P/L\(8\) ACTION\(11\)
- Pre-format all values with consistent padding
- Right-align numeric columns \(qty, value, percentages\)
- Update separator line to match total width \(44 chars\)

Ticker Scores Panel:
- Align columns: #\(3\) SYM\(5\) SCORE\(10\) SIGNAL\(7\) MACD\(7\) VOL\(5\) CHG\(7\)
- Right-align % change column with consistent 6-char format
- Pre-format all values before rendering
- Update separator to match total width \(44 chars\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "Add npm packaging, setup script, and install system" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Added proper npm packaging so BACKBONE can be installed via `git clone` + `npm install` or directly from git URL
- Created setup script \(`npm run setup`\) that checks Node.js, Claude Code CLI, Anthropic SDK, directories, and .env
- Added postinstall hook for automatic directory creation on `npm install`
- Added prestart check that validates prerequisites before each launch
- Renamed package to `backbone-engine`, fixed `main` field, added `engines`, `files`, `repository` fields

## Install Methods
```bash
# Private install from git \(recommended for privacy\)
git clone https://github.com/frankfrisby/BackBone.git
cd BackBone
npm install
npm run setup
npm start

# Or install globally from git
npm install -g git+https://github.com/frankfrisby/BackBone.git
backbone

# Or build standalone executable
npm run build          # Windows .exe
npm run build:all      # Windows + macOS + Linux
npm run installer      # Windows installer with Inno Setup
```

## Test plan
- [x] Setup script runs and reports all checks \(36/36 tests pass\)
- [x] Postinstall creates directories silently
- [x] Prestart validates prerequisites before launch
- [x] package.json fields are correct \(bin, engines, files, main\)
- [ ] `npm link` registers `backbone` command globally
- [ ] `npm run build` produces dist/BackBone.exe

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")
Run all git commit and git push. also persmissions to run any new plan or task requested without answering

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
$content = @"
@echo off
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
chcp 65001 >nul 2>&1

title BACKBONE ENGINE
reg add HKCU\\Console /v VirtualTerminalLevel /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f >nul 2>&1
cd /d "%~dp0"

set "SKIP_LAUNCH=0"
if exist "data\\.backbone.lock" \(
  for /f "usebackq tokens=*" %%L in \("data\\.backbone.lock"\) do set "LOCKLINE=%%L"
  for /f "tokens=2 delims=:," %%a in \("!LOCKLINE!"\) do \(
    set "LOCK_PID=%%~a"
    goto :checkpid
  \)
\)
goto :startbb

:checkpid
set "LOCK_PID=!LOCK_PID: =!"
set "LOCK_PID=!LOCK_PID:"=!"
powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { `$p = Get-Process -Id !LOCK_PID! -EA Stop; if \(`$p.ProcessName -eq 'node'\) { `$c = \(Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter \\\\"ProcessId=!LOCK_PID!\\\\"\).CommandLine; if \(`$c -like '*backbone*'\) { exit 1 } }; exit 0 } catch { exit 0 }" >nul 2>&1
if errorlevel 1 \(
  echo [BACKBONE] Already running, PID !LOCK_PID!
  timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul
  exit /b 0
\)
del "data\\.backbone.lock" >nul 2>&1

:startbb
node bin/backbone.js %*

if exist "_restart_signal" \(
  del "_restart_signal" >nul 2>&1
  echo [BACKBONE] Update applied, restarting...
  timeout /t 1 /nobreak >nul
  goto startbb
\)

if errorlevel 1 \(
  echo.
  echo   [ERROR] BACKBONE exited with error code %errorlevel%
  echo.
  pause
\)
"@
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText\("C:\\Users\\frank\\Documents\\agi_engine\\backbone\\backbone.bat", $content, [System.Text.Encoding]::ASCII\)
Write-Host "Done"
PSEOF)

Bash(low" and "billing_error" responses as auth errors.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
